cards.name: Mural
cards.description:
Unplayable.
Retain.
If this card enters the discard pile, Exhaust it.

cards.name: Frightening Beast
cards.description:
Unplayable.
Whenever a card Purges, Topdeck this.

cards.name: Morthol Dryax
cards.description:
Unplayable.
At the end of your turn, discard your hand.

cards.name: Oglog M'Rubbit
cards.description:
Unplayable.
While in hand, your stats cannot change.

cards.name: Defend
cards.description: Gain 5 (8) Block.

cards.name: Diplomacy
cards.description:
Gain 7 (9) Block.
Deal 7 (9) damage.
Exhaust a card in your hand.

cards.name: Strike
cards.description: Deal 6 (9) damage.

cards.name: Take Inventory
cards.description:
Draw 1 (2) card (cards).
Retain your hand this turn.

cards.name: Key/Handgun
cards.description:
If the enemy intends to attack, gain 8 (11) Block.
Otherwise, deal 8 (11) damage.

cards.name: Moustache Fire
cards.description:
Deal 12 (16) damage.
Topdeck a copy of this.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Belly O' The Whale
cards.description:
Deal 10 (13) damage.
Exhaust a card in your discard pile.

cards.name: Ben Stiller Bust
cards.description:
Retain.
Deal 4 (5) damage.
Drop: Deal 6 (7) damage to ALL enemies.

cards.name: Candy Corn
cards.description:
Unplayable.
At the end of your turn, gain 3 (5) Block.

cards.name: Charisma Blast
cards.description:
Deal 11 (14) damage.
Mill 1.

cards.name: Fortify
cards.description:
Gain 3 (4) Temp._Imagination.
Gain 5 (7) Block.
Topdeck 1 card from your hand.

cards.name: Ignore
cards.description:
Gain 6 (7) Temporary_HP.
Topdeck (Add) 1 Mural (into your hand).

cards.name: Moonshine
cards.description:
Gain 1 Imagination.
Give a card in your hand Retain this combat.
Purge.

cards.name: Ogle
cards.description:
(Retain.)
Deal 7 (8) damage.
Shift the enemy's intent ahead 1 turn.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Pepperminthryl
cards.description:
ALWAYS costs 1.
Gain 11 (14) Block.

cards.name: Pez Uzi
cards.description:
Deal 8 (11) damage to ALL enemies.
Gain 1 (2) Temp._Imagination.

cards.name: Taze
cards.description:
Deal 7 (10) damage.
Apply 1 Weak.
Topdeck a card from your draw pile.

cards.name: Think Ahead
cards.description: Play the top card of your draw pile.

cards.name: Tootsie Shotgun
cards.description:
Deal 5 (7) damage twice.
Damage is increased by Auto-Parry stacks.

cards.name: Truffle Shuffle
cards.description:
Gain 1 Auto-Parry.
Deal 9 (12) damage. 
Purge.

cards.name: Unscale
cards.description:
(Retain.)
You and ALL enemies lose 3 Strength this turn.

cards.name: Victory Pose
cards.description:
Gain 8 (10) Block.
Gain 2 (4) more if an enemy has been slain this combat.

cards.name: Wilson Bust
cards.description:
Retain.
Drop: Gain 6 (9) Block.

cards.name: Appropriate
cards.description:
Put a card from your discard pile into your hand.
Your stats are 0 this turn.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Bite Hardly
cards.description:
Deal 9 (12) damage.
Gain 9 (12) Temporary_HP.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Candy Cane
cards.description:
Deal 7 (10) damage.
Gain 2 (3) Temp._Imagination.

cards.name: Candy Leather
cards.description:
Gain 5 (8) Block.
Return an Imagination card from your discard pile to your hand.

cards.name: Club Club
cards.description:
Deal 6 (8) damage to ALL enemies twice.
Lose 1 of your highest stat.

cards.name: Deprogram
cards.description:
Look at the top 4 cards of your draw pile.
You may discard any of them.
Apply 1 (2) Vulnerable to ALL enemies.

cards.name: Diamond Armor
cards.description:
Gain 14 (17) Block.
Discard 1 card.
Lose 1 of your highest stat.

cards.name: Distill
cards.description:
Obtain a random potion.
Gain 1 Auto-Parry.
Purge.

cards.name: Embarrass
cards.description:
Apply 3 Weak.
Apply 3 Vulnerable.
Topdeck 1 Mural.

cards.name: Fair Shake
cards.description:
Gain 10 (13) Block.
Deal 13 (16) damage to ALL enemies.
Exhaust a card in your hand.

cards.name: Fool Plate
cards.description:
Discard your hand.
Gain 2 Temporary_HP for each card.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Force Deck
cards.description: At the start of your turn, draw 1 card and Topdeck 1 card from your hand.

cards.name: Fortune
cards.description:
Costs 1 less for each Temp._Imagination you have.
Gain 8 (10) Block.
Draw 1 (2) card (cards).

cards.name: Frijolaegis
cards.description:
Whenever you draw this card, add a copy of it into your hand.
Gain 3 (4) Block.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Fudge Deck
cards.description: At the start of your turn, draw 1 card and discard 1 card.

cards.name: Hand Cannon
cards.description:
Deal 16 (20) damage.
Retain your hand this turn.

cards.name: Heart Stab
cards.description:
Deal 10 (14) damage.
Apply 2 Weak.
Apply 2 Vulnerable.
Lose 1 of your highest stat.

cards.name: Joust
cards.description:
Can only be played if no other cards in your hand are Attacks.
Deal 8 (11) damage.
Apply 1 Weak.

cards.name: Kingpin Bust
cards.description:
Retain.
Drop: Gain [E] .

cards.name: Leer
cards.description:
Remove all Block from the (ALL) enemy (enemies).
Deal 3 damage 3 times.
Apply 1 (2) Vulnerable.

cards.name: Opportunity Cost
cards.description:
Permanently upgrade a card in your hand.
~~- Lose 1 of each stat. -~~
Remove this card from your deck.
Purge.

cards.name: Parry
cards.description:
Gain 1 (2) Artifact.
Gain 2 (3) Thorns.
Gain 1 Auto-Parry.

cards.name: Retain Return
cards.description:
Return all cards with Retain from your discard pile to your hand.
At the end of your turn, discard your hand.

cards.name: Retrieve Arms
cards.description:
Unplayable.
Whenever you draw this card, add a (an)  (upgraded) Key/Handgun into your hand.
Ethereal.

cards.name: Snoop Dogg Bust
cards.description:
Retain.
Drop: Apply 1 (2) Weak and 1 Vulnerable to ALL enemies.

cards.name: Spade Dig
cards.description:
Put 1 card from your draw pile into your hand.
Topdeck a card from your discard pile.
Lose 1 of your highest stat.

cards.name: Throw Hat
cards.description:
Gain 6 Block X (+1) times.
Mill X (+1).

cards.name: Tommygun/Keyring
cards.description:
Deal 6 (8) damage twice. / Gain 5 (6) Block twice.
Switches form at the start of your turn.

cards.name: Torso Flail
cards.description: Play a card in your discard pile and Exhaust it.

cards.name: Treaty
cards.description:
Retain.
You and the (ALL) enemy (enemies) cannot gain buffs for 1 turn.

cards.name: Triple Scuffle
cards.description:
Deal 8 (10) damage.
Draw 2 (3) cards.
Discard all cards drawn this way with Retain.

cards.name: Truffle Trouble
cards.description:
Costs 1 less for each Vim card played this combat.
Deal 21 (24) damage.

cards.name: Un-De-Escalate
cards.description:
Retain.
You ~~- and ALL enemies  -~~ lose 1 stack of all debuffs.

cards.name: Weigh In
cards.description:
Innate.
Apply 2 Weak and 1 (2) Vulnerable to ALL enemies.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Wizard's Sudoku
cards.description:
Draw 1 card (and give it Retain this combat).
It costs 0 until played.

cards.name: Brass Tacks
cards.description:
Deal 15 (18) damage to ALL enemies.
Discard your hand, then draw that many cards.

cards.name: Candid Bullets
cards.description:
Gain 3 Strength.
At the end of your turn, lose 1 Imagination.

cards.name: Candy Mech
cards.description:
Gain 16 Block.
Deal 16 damage.
Lose 3 (2) Imagination.

cards.name: Candycorn Vampire
cards.description:
Gain 2 (3) Dexterity.
Gain 3 (6) Malleable.

cards.name: Conjure
cards.description: Choose 2 (3): Deal 6 damage. Apply 2 Weak. Apply 2 Vulnerable.

cards.name: Diabeatdown
cards.description: Deal 24 (30) damage to the enemy with the least HP. If this kills an enemy, repeat it.

cards.name: Gummy Zombie
cards.description: At the end of your turn, gain 1 Temporary_HP for each card in your hand.

cards.name: Hero Bust
cards.description:
Retain.
Drop: Prevent the next time you would lose HP.

cards.name: Hit the Mattresses
cards.description:
Deal damage equal to your combined stats.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Leverage Height
cards.description:
Deal 12 (15) damage.
Discard 1 (2) card (cards).
Draw 1 (2) card (cards).

cards.name: Machinegun/Hairpin
cards.description:
Deal 8 (10) damage twice. / Gain 7 (9) Block twice.
Switches form whenever played.

cards.name: Mob Rule
cards.description:
ALL enemies become Stunned.
Topdeck 4 (3) Murals.

cards.name: Roll Boxcars
cards.description:
Add any 1 of the 4  (upgraded) Midnight Cards to your hand.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Supermassive
cards.description:
Gain Block equal to your Vim.
Reflect damage this turn.
Exhaust.

cards.name: The Zillyhammer
cards.description:
Deal 30 (40) damage to ALL enemies.
Lose 5 (4) Imagination.

cards.name: Tootsiestein
cards.description: Whenever you play an Imagination card, draw 1 card.

cards.name: Weird Puzzle Shit
cards.description:
Costs 1 more for every 2 cards in your draw pile.
Add a (an)  (upgraded) Moustache_Fire into your hand.

relics.name: Typewriter
relics.description: When a card Purges, gain 1 Temp. HP and ALL enemies lose 1 Strength this turn.
relics.flavorText: Type up an UNPLEASANT NOTE to increase the enemy's SICK BURN levels.

relics.name: Bowen Stilson Dogg
relics.description: At the start of each combat, discard 1 card from your draw pile.

relics.name: Jester of Encumbrance
relics.description: At the start of each combat, choose a card in your draw pile and give it to an enemy. That card is put into your hand when the enemy is slain.
relics.flavorText: Exiled from CLOWN TERRITORY for the crime of BEING MISPLACED BY THE CLOWN PONTIFICATE.

relics.name: Elf Eggs
relics.description: Whenever you enter a Rest Site, increase your Max HP by 3.
relics.flavorText: You yearn to crack out the succulent yolk.

relics.name: HAMPER OF THE JADED FOOL'S ENNUI
relics.flavorText: The Clown Pontificate (hereafter: "CP") has granted one (1) boon (hereafter: "the product") in exchange for the services rendered by you to slay the spire. The product may be leased for up to three combat encounters (hereafter: "battles") due to the eventuality in which the merchant (hereafter: "dead-o") is murdered. The product will be returned to CP within 3-4 business days.

relics.name: Salted Melon
relics.description: Whenever you enter a Rest Site, increase your Max HP by 1.
relics.flavorText: The tastiest QUEST OF SPIRIT is satisfied.

relics.name: Tectrixcalibur
relics.description: Start each combat with 2 Strength and 1 Dexterity.

relics.name: Affinity Crow
relics.description: Enemies cannot intend to attack for more than 30 damage.

relics.name: Megaton Key
relics.description:
Gain [E] at the start of your turn.
Upon pickup, lose your leftmost 2 relics.
relics.flavorText: These brass knuckles are so heavy.

relics.name: Call of Fluthlu
relics.description: At the start of your turn, add a Dazed into your hand.

relics.name: Jammed Printer
relics.description: You draw cards from the 2nd from top position of your draw pile.

relics.name: Sextant
relics.description: You can see the contents of ? rooms.

potions.name: Demotion Potion
potions.description: Enemy cannot gain Strength above 0 or debuff you.

keywords.name: Auto-parry
keywords.description: At the end of combat or whenever you lose HP, gain 1 Vim and lose 1 Auto-Parry.

keywords.name: Drop
keywords.description: Effect activates whenever this card enters the discard or exhaust pile.

keywords.name: Mill
keywords.description: Discard an amount of cards from the top of your draw pile.

keywords.name: Moustache fire
keywords.description: A 0-Cost Attack that puts a copy of itself on top of your draw pile.

keywords.name: Mural
keywords.description: Murals are unplayable status cards that Retain and Exhaust when discarded.

keywords.name: Temp. imagination
keywords.description: Temporary Imagination disappears at the end of combat.

keywords.name: Topdeck
keywords.description: Place on top of your draw pile.
